meanings.sent1: The mahoganies in the forest were tall and majestic.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter crafted a beautiful table from mahoganies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the mahoganies to build a tiny fort.
meanings.sent4: The mahoganies stood like ancient guardians in the woods.
meanings.sent5: The rich color of the mahoganies added warmth to the room.

meanings.definition: Mahoganies: a type of wood commonly used in furniture making
meanings.sent1: The antique dresser was made of mahoganies.
meanings.sent2: The cabinet maker preferred working with mahoganies due to their durability.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat scratched the mahoganies, thinking they were trees.
meanings.sent4: The mahoganies gleamed in the sunlight, showcasing their quality.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly cut mahoganies filled the workshop.
